HERO.DESCRIPTION: Log your weigh-ins and workouts with ease. Stay consistent and achieve your fitness goals.

ABOUT.TITLE: About KeepItUp
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: Helping you stay consistent and track your progress towards achieving a healthier you.
ABOUT.TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Easy-to-use tools for logging weigh-ins, tracking workouts, and staying motivated.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features
FEATURES.LOG_WEIGH_INS_DESCRIPTION: Track your weight every week to monitor your progress over time.
FEATURES.LOG_WORKOUTS_DESCRIPTION: Record your exercises and track your fitness routine effortlessly.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Have questions or need support? We're here to help! Connect with us:

CTA.TITLE: Start Your Journey Today
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Sign up for free and take the first step towards a healthier you.

MSG.FAILED_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
MSG.UNKNOWN_LOGIN_ERROR: An error occurred while logging in. Please try again later.
MSG.FETCH_ERROR: An error occurred while fetching user information. Please try again later.
MSG.UNAUTHORIZED: Unauthorized access. Please log in again.
MSG.ERROR_CREATING_WORKOUT: Error creating workout. Please try again later.

TOAST_MSGS.REGISTER: Registered successfully. You can now log in.
TOAST_MSGS.ERROR_REGISTER: Error registering user. Please try again later.

TOAST_MSGS.ERROR_CREATED: Error creating workout. Please try again.
TOAST_MSGS.CANT_DELETE_ALL_SETS: You cannot delete all sets from an exercise.
TOAST_MSGS.PLEASE_FILL_ALL_FIELDS: Please fill out the last set before adding a new one.
TOAST_MSGS.SUCCESSFUL_RESETPASSWORD: Password reset successful. You can now log in.
TOAST_MSGS.FAILED_RESETING: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
TOAST_MSGS.FAILED_RESET_LINK: Failed to send the reset link. Please try again.
